timeline.bodyText: Under what conditions might this happen?
timeline.author: Lineflyer

replies.bodyText:
This is the $1,000 question (and the reason why I called this a mitigation).
When I debug backwards from the error position I can see that this is the condition which leads to the error. I only do not know where it origins from. Also I cannot reproduce it. So I decided to go for a mitigation for now.
replies.author: moving-bits

replies.bodyText: maybe imported waypoints from a GPX?
replies.author: Lineflyer

replies.bodyText: But you have to consider, that this is a new crash with current beta, which makes my previous comment unlikely.
replies.author: Lineflyer

replies.bodyText: May be. Do you happen to have some test data for this case?
replies.author: moving-bits

replies.bodyText: No, it was just a guess.
replies.author: Lineflyer
